gov.nih.nlm.meme.client
Interface MEMERequestClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
HTTPRequestClient
public interface MEMERequestClient

This is a generic interface for handling requests on the client side. Implementations of this interface will use a specific network protocol (such as HTTP) to connect to the server. Following is an example how to use this interface: 

   MEMEServiceRequest request = ...;
   MEMERequestClient client = ...;
   client.setHost("example.com");
   client.setPort(8080);
   request = client.processRequest(request);
Implementations of this class should rarely be used directly but instead should be used by subclassing the ClientAPI.

Author:
MEME Group

processRequest

public MEMEServiceRequest processRequest(MEMEServiceRequest request)
                                  throws MEMEException
This method is responsible for sending the request to the server and processing the response.

Parameters:
request - the MEMEServiceRequest
Returns:
the MEMEServiceRequest response
Throws:
